message.content:
{"id": "17894", 
"title": "Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults", 
"description": "When the Open Mode preference is changed to Single Click and the checkboxes are selected, clicking on the 'Restore Defaults' button does not reset the Open Mode preference to Double Click and clear the checkboxes.", 
"OB": "The Open Mode preference is not reset to Double Click and the checkboxes are not cleared when 'Restore Defaults' is clicked.", 
"EB": "The Open Mode preference should be reset to Double Click and the checkboxes should be cleared when 'Restore Defaults' is clicked.", 
"SR": "In the Workbench preferences, after changing the Open Mode to Single Click and selecting both checkboxes, clicking on 'Restore Defaults' should revert the Open Mode to Double Click and clear both checkboxes."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '17894', 'title': 'Bug 17894Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults', 'description': '', 'OB': 'Bug 17894Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Build 20020521 go to Workbench prefs change Open Mode to Single Click and select both checkboxes Restore Defaults no change to theseIt should revert to Double Click and clear both checkboxes '}
